name: Santa's Shop
description:
Help Santa's shop out by baking, cleaning up, managing, and shopping at his store! There are a lot of activities to do to get right into the Christmas spirit! Have fun, and have a Merry Christmas!

Features:
- Help Santa by cleaning, picking up & recycling
- Shop at Santa's store
- Cut cookies
- Bake cakes, cookies, donuts & more!
- Drop items into the basket as fast as you can
- Free to Play!
